name: Asylum and Deportation Defense Program
description: Program provides legal consultations and represents children, adults, and families residing in the San Francisco community before the San Francisco Immigration Court and the San Francisco Asylum Office Additional resources are available by visiting the website and clicking on the link. Resources: - San Francisco Immigration Court - San Francisco Asylum Office - Information on how to check for your next court date - EOIR (Immigration Court or Board of Immigration Appeals) case information hotline
